page.text: You have overcome the gold raptor, she's at your mercy. What do you wish to do?

choice.text: put that cock of hers to work

page.text: You have devoured your prey in some unspecified, unelaborated on yet satisfying way.

Standing over her your eyes can't help but to wander over her curves, after managing to overpower such an alluring creature you can't help yourself – adrenaline and excitement, perhaps a dash of fear still running through your system, but you want more, and its clear how she can give it to you.

With a shrill cry the raptor-girl shifts, trying to dislodge you, yet already your chest is smushing down against her own, shamelessly rubbing your crotch against the hardening shaft. The golden raptor can't help but note the lust in your eyes, unable to resist as it was cowed by your stubborn insistance – it lets out a guttural whine, pushing you down onto its thick shaft with a lustful moan. With wicked glee you so eager pin down the golden raptors limbs, bucking against your hips needily and greedily as you take inch after inch of the member, your muscles already clenching down upon the steadily hardening shaft.

After a few moments she surrenders to your growing lusts, thrusting herself into you deeply, the hard shaft properly lubricated by your growing desire. Lust overrides reason as your lips latch onto its neck, suckling and kissing against the cool scales, bucking and thrusting, it takes no time at all for you both to get so excited, the sounds of your moans and its guttural squeals echoing into the air. Unable to help yourself you let out a desperate cry as you are pushed to your peak – the golden raptor shifts, grasping at your arms with clawed hands digging into the tender skin – she thrusts firmly again and again, such noises escaping from its jaws until a flood of its seed spills out inside of you, leaving you a panting, twitching mess.

As you try to dismount yourself the raptor-girl seems to smirk up as you, even from your dominant position she is already bucking her hips back into you, elicting another whine from your lips – still warm from your first peak the raptor-girl doesn't seem like she is done with you yet, despite how the tables were in your favour. With each buck and thrust she groans, and you feel compelled to ride them, shivering as that hard shaft buries itself deeper and deeper inside of you, crying out with such wanton lust! Without waiting, the raptor-girl is on top of you, working its shaft fully inside of you, losing itself to its own carnal needs, again and again pounding your needy folds until another screech, and a spray of raptor nectar fills your fuckhole. Satified, the golden raptor takes barely a moment to steady herself, already its quick reflexes allowed it to regain its footing – not hesitating to slink away into the darkness, feeling very satisfied with itself despite losing the fight for dominance.
